Application of P1 radiation models and methods to solve

  • P1 method is widely used radiation models in the high fidely combustion application using Conjugate gradient method as suggested by [3].

  • P1 method is also widely used in the prediction of arc temperature from the nozzle arcs as suggested by [4].

  • There have been many proposal on solving radiation using implicit formulations one which includes multi-grid approach as suggested by [5].

  • Many researchers have developed various efficient algorithms for multi-grid as sugested in works of [6].
